channel.title: Rust Lang - Compiler Team
channel.description: Recent content on Rust Lang - Compiler Team

item.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Looks like no questions have been asked yet! If you have a question, feel free to file an issue or ask in the working group’s Zulip stream.

Meta Meeting Notes This document contains meeting notes from the Meta working group. 2019-02-28: Meeting Written by: @spastorino What problems do we want to solve from a compiler team member perspective and from a contributor perspective? Help to grow the team by ensuring that we engage people who’ve started to get active in rustc? Provide a source of people who can help implement things without needing as much mentoring?
